oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Differential Games of Mixed Type with Control and Stopping Times

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study a zero sum differential game of mixed type where each player uses both control and stopping times. Under certain conditions we show that the value function for this problem exists and is the unique viscosity solution of the corresponding variational inequalities. We also show the existence of saddle point equilibrium for a special case of differential game.
